titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permit penalty-free distributions from qualified retirement plans for unemployed individuals.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2224)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 3/2/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow penalty-free withdrawals from retirement plans by individuals who are unemployed, if: (1) such individuals have received unemployment compensation for 12 consecutive weeks; and (2) distributions are made in the year during which such compensation was paid or the succeeding year.
